metadata.title: CVE-2020-11668 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel before 5.6.1, drivers/media/usb/gspca/xirlink_cit.c(aka the Xirlink camera USB driver) mishandles invalid descriptors, akaCID-a246b4d54770.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-11668` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-99-generic - 4.15.0-99.100
linux-image-4.15.0-99-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-99.100
linux-image-4.15.0-99-lowlatency - 4.15.0-99.100
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-99-generic - 4.15.0-99.100
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-99-lowlatency - 4.15.0-99.100
No subscription required

linux-image-5.3.0-53-generic - 5.3.0-53.47~18.04.1
